overview:
Jason Stoddard is the founder and Managing Partner, Strategy for Centric / Agency of Change, a full-service, forward-looking interactive agency, as well as an award-winning science fiction author.

Jason is a requested speaker on social media marketing, emerging marketing, augmented reality, and virtual worlds. He’s spoken at Harvard, Loyola Marymount, Internet Strategy Forum, Virtual Worlds Expo, Home Entertainment Summit, The Marketing Forum, and the eMarketing forum, among others.
